thumb.title: Festivals of Akita (AI-Created Song: English Version)
thumb.description: This time, I’d like to share with you some of the most exciting and charming festivals of Akita Prefecture.I'm grateful to UDIO for singing the English version so well.If you notice any issues or have feedback, please feel free to let me know.The character featured is Wakana Nagami, a rookie announcer created and introduced by the AI.She’s still not very good at English but is studying hard (according to her character background).She also loves hot springs (which probably means her face is often a bit flushed).今回は秋田県の魅力的なお祭りについてお伝えします。DUIOさんは英語は本当に比較的しっかり歌っていただいてありがたいです。問題等ございましたらご指摘いただければと思います。キャラクターはAIが紹介（作成）してくれた新人アナウンサーの「永海 若菜」さんです。まだまだ苦手だけど英語勉強中（という設定）です。また温泉好き（と設定に入れたので多分顔が赤い。）
